mapper.select: select * from story where story_p_no = 1 and story_a_no not in (1)
select * from story where story_p_no = 1 and story_a_no = 1
select * from story where story_p_no = 2 and story_a_no not in (1)
select * from story where story_p_no = 2 and story_a_no = 1
select * from story where story_p_no = 3 and story_a_no not in (1)
select * from story where story_p_no = 3 and story_a_no = 1
